points.title: Consume Responsibly
points.description: Opt for products that are certified as sustainable, and minimize consumption of goods linked to deforestation.

points.title: Donate to Conservation Groups
points.description: Support organizations that work directly to protect and preserve the Amazon rainforest.

points.title: Share Information
points.description: Utilize social media to educate friends and family about the importance of the Amazon and the threats it faces.

points.title: Host Community Events
points.description: Arrange educational seminars, workshops, or movie nights with documentaries focusing on the Amazon.

points.title: Purchase Indigenous Products
points.description: Support the local economy by buying goods produced by indigenous communities.

points.title: Volunteer or Partner
points.description: Collaborate with organizations working to empower indigenous communities within the Amazon.

points.title: Use Renewable Energy
points.description: Consider switching to green energy providers or installing solar panels. Minimize waste and consumption.

points.title: Reduce, Reuse, Recycle
points.description: Minimize waste and consumption to lessen your impact on the environment.

points.title: Sign Petitions
points.description: Join or create petitions urging governments and corporations to enact responsible policies.

points.title: Vote Responsibly
points.description: Support political candidates who prioritize environmental and social responsibility.

points.title: Buy Organic and Local
points.description: Purchase produce that adheres to environmentally friendly agricultural practices.

points.title: Promote Responsible Farming
points.description: Encourage and support local farmers who employ sustainable practices.
